channel.title: DivineX 718 Pking server / PvM / skills / 24/7 / active players
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=6]DivineX[/SIZE]
DivineX. The place where all adventure start. A mystical server with great twist around every corner. This server provides a huge amount of things like. Quest. Bosses from Wolverine to Queen Black Dragon. Train all skills. Emotions. Shops and not just normal shops vote shops, donator shops, shops for each skill and just random shops like clothing, One of the best PVP safe PVP, normal PVP and high risk PVP. IF YOU'RE MAN ENOUGH. So come today and start your journey and see where you will end up.
LIST FOR THE THINGS WHICH ARE FEATURED
PVM
Tormented Demons
Queen Black Dragon
YK’lagor the Thunderous
Blink(custom boss.)
Nomand(Quest)
Avatar
Wolverine
Ice Troll King
Mutant Tarn
Giant Mole
Giant Roc
SKILLING
All skills work.
PVP
Safe PVP
Normal PVP
High Risk PVP
Crucible Bounty
Mini-Game
Dominion Tower
Duel Areana
Castle Wars
Livid Farm
Fight Kiln
And Also Voting System.
